about_the_game: It makes you LARGE. Show the world your extreme massive SCHLONG. Tell and show your friends how thicc your third leg is. Email a picture to your grandmother so that she finally can be proud of you. This will change your life. Having a mega-PIPE between your legs is an absolute win for everyone. Maybe you will change the world. THIS is the first step.
detailed_description: It makes you LARGE. Show the world your extreme massive SCHLONG. Tell and show your friends how thicc your third leg is. Email a picture to your grandmother so that she finally can be proud of you. This will change your life. Having a mega-PIPE between your legs is an absolute win for everyone. Maybe you will change the world. THIS is the first step.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Catalina or newer
  • Processor: 2,7 GHz Dual-Core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics 6100
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Get it Hard - BBC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-7600
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
